ComicInfo.Title: Beware! If This Be... Ragnarok!
ComicInfo.Summary: Beware! If This Be... Ragnarok!: As Thor lies prone at the mercy of Pluto, who wields his axe in preparation for the killing stroke, the Three Norn Fates summon a vision of Ragnarok. Realising that Thor has a role to play in the twilight of the gods, the sisters send forth an energy bolt which shatters Plutoâ€™s axe.
